Control Name: Creates and Retains Record of Authorized Disclosures—The entity creates and maintains a record of authorized disclosures of personal information that is complete, accurate, and timely.

control_attributes.Control: Creates and Retains Record of Authorized Disclosures—The entity creates and maintains a record of authorized disclosures of personal information that is complete, accurate, and timely.
control_attributes.SubCategory: P6.2 The entity creates and retains a complete, accurate, and timely record of authorized disclosures of personal information to meet the entity’s objectives related to privacy
